System Status

Operational status for our secure systems and services.

All Systems Operational

Our public website and Azure Government services are currently operating normally.

Public Website

Operational

Our public marketing website is fully operational and accessible.

Azure Government Portal

Operational

Our secure Azure Government environment is operational and accessible to authorized users.

Contact Form

In Development

Contact form integration is in progress. Please use email for immediate assistance.

Future Status Updates

Operational status for secure systems will be provided via Azure Government tooling in the future. This will include:

  • Real-time service availability monitoring
  • Incident reporting and resolution updates
  • Planned maintenance notifications
  • Performance metrics and uptime statistics

Azure Government Status

For detailed status information about Azure Government services, please refer to the official Microsoft Azure Government status page or contact our team directly.
